phrases: That is the least of our problems.
And you are the heir to a yakuza syndicate?
This is the boss of the Beehive gangster outfit.
Ardelt Kirisaki-Wagner and his daughter, Miss Kirisaki Chitoge!
I have heard all about you from your father.
It is great to finally meet you, Raku-kun.
I am never getting together with this guy!
It will never work out with a maniac like her!
That is great and all, but it is the only way we can prevent this war.
These Shuei-gumi rats really did kidnap you!
As an executive leader of the beehive, your protection is my highest priority!
Therefore I have taken it upon myself to come rescue you!
Well, well, if it is not one of the Beehive's top dogs!
Don'tcha think you are way outta line?
I have been going easy on you so far, but...
This time around, you will get no mercy!
I will teach you what happens to guys who mess with our precious Mistress!
I think there is been a misunderstanding!
You could not be further from the truth.
These two are head-over-heels for each other!
And we have given them our blessing.
You have finally snagged yourself a girlfriend, eh?
Oh, man, we have been worried about you for the longest time!
Not having a single girlfriend at your age...
You have grown up, and I have failed to even notice!
My dear Mistress, over the years I have guarded you, you have become a fine young lady!
I would not be your Claude if I were not overcome with joy!
For you, Young Master, we will gladly declare a ceasefire!
Let us throw our full support behind her, so that she may date him peacefully!
Since when are we a couple?
Why should I have to date this gorilla woman?
Who would want to date this bean sprout?
You did not really call our lady a gorilla woman, did you?
What do you think you are doing to our Young Master?
If you touch a single hair on his head, you are a dead man.
Are you two... really boyfriend and girlfriend?
What do we do about this?!
At this point, playing along is our only option!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
It is all or nothing now!
We will have to fake it!
Of course we are totally hot for each other!
I meant that she is as strong and sweet as a gorilla!
I just wanted to show you that our love is not just any love.
Oh, there you go again, darling!
Do not confuse them like that!
But of course, that is what I love about youyour skin's as snow-white as a bean sprout!
So you two are head-over-heels in love, after all?
How did we end up like this?
Cannot you see it is no use complaining?
There is no way we are getting out of this now.
I know we are a couple now, but what are we supposed to do?
It is not like I have ever dated anyone before.
Neither have I, for your information.
I am not so good at things like romance.
I do not really get it.
Thanks for finding this, by the way.
It would have been awkward if we broke it off like that.
Well, now you can go ahead and show me your eternal gratitude!
I mean, it really seems important to you.
Is it a keepsake from someone who died?
No, someone gave it to me.
I was traveling overseas with my dad, and...
I got pretty close with this girl I met.
She told me, We will meet again,
and gave this to me as a token of our promise.
I cannot remember her name or what she looked like.
All I remember is our promise.
Maybe I am just hoping that if I hold onto it, we might actually meet again.
I know you hate me for that, though.
Dwelling on the past and all...
What I hate is the kind of guy who keeps brooding over past mistakes
and other things that he cannot possibly change.
But I cannot say I hate romantic stories like yours.
Anyway, we are going to do something about this situation AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
I cannot stand the thought of dating you!
I could say the same, you moronic bean sprout!
Young Master, you have a visitor!
Sorry to spring this on you,
but would you go on a date with me right now?
Because that is what couples do!
Oh, jeez, what have I done to deserve this?
We are not getting out of this, remember?
What are we going to do?
Do not look at me, I do not have a clue!
Is not it the guy's job to escort the girl around?
You really know how to piss someone off at every turn.
That said, I have never really gotten up close and personal with a girl, let alone gone on a date with one.
How should I know what to do on a date?
Of all the dates with Onodera that I have fantasized about,
the ideal one had us sitting at a fashionable cafe and talking to each other,
then going to see a movie together,
and finally taking a walk in a gorgeous park together.
What kind of crappy beans are these?
How can you live with yourselves, charging 600 yen for this!
Could this meat be any more rubbery?
I saw the commercial, and it has the mother of all explosion scenes!
No, we have to see this one!
It is a four-handkerchief tearjerker and it is a current blockbuster!
Well, I guess this is what couples usually watch.
can look kind of cute when she is asleep.
As long as she is not talking or moving.
She is not cute at all!
Want To go to a cafe with us?
Unfortunately, I happen to be waiting for someone right now.
Wait, a bean sprout's technically a vegetable...
You are funny, are not you?
Look, just hang out with us,'kay?
We will show you a great time!
Oh, come on, we know you are alone.
We will take good care of you!
Got To say, you do have an amazing ass!
Wait, you are half-Japanese, are not you?
Do not worry, we would never do that to you.
See, she still does not understand a word of Japanese!
Sorry to keep you waiting, Kirisaki!
Come on, let us get out of here.
Where do you think you are going?
Were you trying to play the hero who saves the girl from the bad guys?
I hate to break it to you, but in two seconds those guys could have been
You need to pick your battles!
Do not get the wrong idea.
I am not defending those guys.
If you whale on creeps who are not even worth whaling on,
that is as good as admitting you are on their level!
Do not be such a lame-ass!
Who are you to talk to me like that?
You do not have to tell me!
As if I would ever give those guys the time of day!
It might have been for the briefest moment,
but for the first time in my life, I held hands with a girl.
I knew it would be like this!
Not only did you bore me to death, but you had to start lecturing me too!
I would not really call it the worst of the worst.
On a scale of 1-100, today's date,
after adding in double bonus points...
I guess I will give you a score of 1.
For the first time in my life,
I let a guy lead me by the hand.
I really cannot seem to figure her out.
Oh, man, if only I was on a date with Onodera!
That would totally be a dream come true!
I just saw you and was about to say hi.
What are you doing here, Ichijou-kun?
Me? I just finished shopping with my friends so I am on my way home.
I was about to say hi and surprise you,
but then all of a sudden, you said my name first!
So anyway, something is off about them, you see?
I am getting the same vibe.
The two of'them are acting weird.
Yeah, like there is no sign of them being all into each other like they were at the Yakuza's house..
They are like an unnatural couple.
Plus, they were arguing and all, which raises more suspicions.
We have to do something, or all of today's suffering will have been for nothing!
Time to really lay it on thick!
I took way longer than I thought.
Did she just call you... darling?
If she is calling you darling, then that means...
You two are... uh... dating each other?
Why would I be dating her?!
But I do not want Onodera to think we are dating!
But... what am I supposed to do?
We just started going out the other day!
I am telling you, he is totally smitten with me!
I know it is embarrassing in front of a classmate,
but what else can we do?!
If it were just any classmate, I would play the hell out of this role!
What am I supposed to do?
I have no clue what she is talking about!
I just had a lovely dinner with my darling.
She insisted she wanted to eat meat!
Every single weekend, he asks me to the movies.
I just happened to have tickets, that is all!
Not to mention, I am actually the type who prefers to go alone.
I am warning you, knock it off!
And anyway, this girl drools while she dozes off at the movies, you know!
I just remembered something I have to do!
Are you sure you want to let Kirisaki-san run off by herself?
I will catch up soon enough.
Although I was not able to trip them up today, I am convinced now!
There is definitely something fishy going on.
Just you wait, you little scumbag twerp!
I will personally crush any fly that gets near the Mistress!
The truth is, we are not a coup
You do not have to say any more, okay?
You should not deny it, though.
Even if you are just hiding your embarrassment,
but you might hurt Kirisaki-san's feelings.
I think you two are perfect together!
It is so obvious that you are infatuated with each other!
She is totally convinced that we are a couple!
Why are the gods subjecting me to such an ordeal?
You were in the middle of a date, right?
I will be on my way.
Is it all right if I ask you just one question?
I was wondering if you would ever seen this pendant before yesterday.
Like, maybe when you were little.
All right, I have to go now, okay?
You would better not keep Kirisaki-san waiting,
Sorry I kept you waiting, Kirisaki!
How dare you show your face, gutter-bug!
What do you think you are doing?
Do you have any idea how humiliating that was?!
But you, on the other hand!
I know that, so just hear me out...
Well, it is a... um... you know!
Wow, you are more straightforward than you look.
Yeah, well, it is called a dorayaki.
It does not taste like the ones from my favorite shop,
but trust me, it is still pretty awesome.
I used a new recipe for these dorayaki.
Do you want to try one?
No, I think I will pass.
I will be in my room.
Asking him will be all the more difficult.
Ichijou-kun is this type of person
Ichijou-kun is this type of person
You have been taking care of all these animals by yourself?
I have to say, you did not do half bad, considering how many there are.
They are practically family to me!
I bet you have been waiting for this.
You guys are such a helpless bunch!
Looks more like they hate you.
Exactly how many animals do you have here?
About ninety, if I had to say?
So like, do they all have names?
I have only decided on half, though.
I thought they were your family.
It is precisely because they are family!
Naming them is a very delicate process!
What is wrong, Divine Spacer Kuniyoshi?
Kirisaki-san is this type of person
Why do not you try naming them, then?!
Do not come up with anything funny, though.
In that case, this little one is...
At any rate, since you are also in charge of raising them,
at least get to know the ones that already have names.
Look, this is Rodriguez IV, the turtle.
I wonder how he would taste grilled.
And this chicken is Kato the Crusher.
